dc_title_s: A new map of Illinois : with its proposed canals, roads & distances from place to place along the stage & steam boat routes.
dc_description_s: Copyright entered by H.N. Burroughs.;Detached from an atlas, no. 31.;Includes table of steam boat routes.; Lead region.; Washington.;Relief shown pictorially.;1 map, colored;35 x 26 cm.;ca. 1:2,000,000;Published by S. Augustus Mitchell, N.E. corner of Market & 7th Streets, 1848.
